entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
